scripts.archive: rimraf foodweb.zip && git archive -o foodweb.zip $(git stash create)
scripts.build: cd ./server && npm run build web && cd ../client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.clean: cd ./server && npm run clean && cd ../client && npm run clean && cd ../shared && npm run clean && cd ../ && rimraf foodweb.zip && rimraf *.log
scripts.lint: cd ./server && npm run lint all && cd ../client && npm run lint && cd ../
scripts.start: npm run stop && npm run start:web && npm run start:admin && npm run logs
scripts.start:admin: cross-env ADMIN=true PORT=8081 forever start -a -l admin.log -o admin.log -e admin.log server/dist/server/projects/admin/src/index.js
scripts.start:qa: cross-env QA=true PORT=8082 forever start -a -l qa.log -o qa.log -e qa.log server/dist/server/projects/web/src/index.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && cd ./server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run test && cd ../
